topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5573efdf6368726326001e88#post_5573efdf6368726326001e88
nope, getting drunk with that one guy you met at the bar who happened to hate life just as much as you do is the best party

until he kills himself and youre left with guilt because you may have tipped him over the edge and youve realized that youll never have as good of a friend as he was, with only years of precious memories of conversations and experiences to fill the void he left burnt in your heart

and you realize that its not enough, and it never will be enough
